about_the_game:
Imagine finding yourself in a bleak world where the fight for survival intensifies with every passing second. "Undead Uprising" plunges you into a post-apocalyptic setting where hordes of zombies have taken control. It's up to you to battle through the relentless waves of the undead.

Using a familiar and trusted system, you harness your skills and strategies to protect yourself and your team from the ever-growing zombie horde. But beware! The zombies become stronger, more cunning, and more numerous with each wave. Your survival hinges on your abilities, teamwork, and the choices you make.

Grab your weapon, kill zombies, gather points to buy new weapons and power-ups, or simply try to top the leaderboards.

"Undead Uprising" is still in development, and the developers are continually working to enhance your gaming experience. Regular updates and fresh content consistently reshape and expand the game world, ensuring that even as a seasoned player, you always face new challenges and surprises.

Join the battle, build barricades, find resources, and outsmart the undead! The fate of humanity is in your hands. Are you ready for "Undead Uprising"?

content_descriptors.notes: It`s a Zombie-Based-Shooter, so you gonna see Blood, Zombies, Gore and Weapons. There are different Characters with differnt Clothing, so you could also see light clothed Male and Female Actors at some Point.

name: Undead Uprising

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-7700HQ CPU @ 2.80GHz 2.81 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 1050 TI
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce RTX 2080 Super
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: "Undead Uprising" immerses you in a post-apocalyptic world swarming with zombies. Battle through endless waves of the undead. Continuously evolving, the game offers regular updates and fresh content. The fate of humanity rests in your hands. Are you ready?
